title: Media Transparency
description: Flows of advertisement and sponsoring money from Austrian government entities to media institutions, which are collectively published as open government data on media transparency (coverage: 2017 Q3-2018 Q2).

title: Asylum Seekers
description: The data presents information about asylum applications lodged in 38 European and 6 non-European countries. Data are broken down by month and origin.

title: Farm Subsidies
description: Aggregated data from farm subsidy payments to reveal flows from different subsidy schemes to locations (sum of recipients).

title: Official Development Assistance
description: ODA commitments by EU countries plus selected other countries and foundations to recipient countries in Afrika, Asia, and Europe; constant prices 2016; coverage 2008-2017 (incomplete).

title: Interruptions in Parliament (by Interrupting Member)
description: The transcription of debates in the Austrian Parliament were analyzed by the VALiD team to quantify interruptions during speeches in plenary session. The dataset at hand shows interruptions by member of parliament, party of interrupted speaker, and calendar year (coverage 28 Oct 2008 - 18 Apr 2018).

title: Interruptions in Parliament (by Party)
description: The transcription of debates in the Austrian Parliament were analyzed by the VALiD team to quantify interruptions during speeches in plenary session. The dataset at hand shows interruptions by party of interruptor, party of interrupted speaker, and period of legislature (coverage 28 Oct 2008 - 18 Apr 2018).

title: Interruptions in Parliament (by Interrupted Speaker)
description: The transcription of debates in the Austrian Parliament were analyzed by the VALiD team to quantify interruptions during speeches in plenary session. The dataset at hand shows different types of interruptions (Zwischenruf, Heiterkeit, Beifall, Richtung) by party of interruptor, interrupted speaker, and calendar year (coverage 28 Oct 2008 - 18 Apr 2018).

title: Interruptions in Parliament (by Member)
description: The transcription of debates in the Austrian Parliament were analyzed by the VALiD team to quantify interruptions during speeches in plenary session. The dataset at hand shows different types of interruptions (Zwischenruf, Heiterkeit, Beifall, Richtung) by member of parliament, interrupted speaker, and period of legislature (coverage 28 Oct 2008 - 18 Apr 2018).

title: Simple Example
description: A simple example 'file' with only a few entries. Great as a template for your own data.
